amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds by EPA to move forward with the Phase 2 rule for new medium- and heavy-duty trucks by clarifying that glider kits and glider vehicles are not new trucks.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds by the EPA to finalize, implement, administer, or enforce a revision of the Code of Federal Regulations or any rule with respect to glider kits and glider vehicles.
